    Installation

    Installation

    So far, the package has not been registered with Julia.

    Steps:

    1. Create a directory for Julia packages which have not been registered, let us denote this as PKG_DIR

    1. cd to PKG_DIR and clone this repository:

      Either from WIAS rhodecode server

         git clone  https://repos.wias-berlin.de/users/fuhrmann/projects/julia-packages/TwoPointFluxFVM
     Or from github:
         git clone  https://github.com/j-fu/TwoPointFluxFVM.jl TwoPointFluxFVM
    1. Add the following line to the file .julia/config/startup.jl in your home directory (create this file it does not exist). PKG_DIR must be the full path name of the directory.
         push!(LOAD_PATH, "PKG_DIR")

    Now, import TwoPointFluxFVM should work in Julia scripts.
